name: Maize Puncher
description:
So, the random topic generator left me with Space/Labyrinth/Farm, so yeah.  Here's a 5 level... uh.... thing.  Some things are still a little glitchy... like the transition scenes... the endgame scene... the quit button (not on the title screen, the in game one), but the general gameplay works.  For what it is.

I'd say that someday I'll go back and make this a more polished product, but it's not likely.  I'll leave this shiny little turd where it lies.  Enjoy.

BUT!!!!!!  The newest version has MUSIC!  By Mr. Liam Hoff!  An extremely talented young man.  Check it out!

Note:  If you get to the credits scene and run off the edge, then press escape, that is the ONLY time the quit button is working.

I DON'T KNOW WHY!!!!
